headline: Fractional CRO @ TeamRevenue | Driving Sales Growth
summary:
With over 15 years of experience as a senior sales leader, I have a passion for helping technology companies grow their revenue, market share, and customer loyalty. I currently work as a Fractional Sales Leader at TeamRevenue, a sales consulting firm that provides strategic guidance and execution support to B2B SaaS startups and scale-ups.

As a Fractional Sales Leader, I mentor and motivate high-performance sales teams, implement programs and strategies that align technology with business goals, and manage stakeholder communications and expectations. I also leverage my certifications and competencies in social selling, value selling, key account management, and CRM to gain trusted advisor status with executive-level partner and client decision makers.

experiences.title: Fractional Sales Leader
experiences.description: As a Fractional Sales Leader, I bring strategic insights and operational excellence to drive sales growth and achieve business goals in a flexible capacity.

experiences.title: Senior Director - Mid Market & Commercial Sales

experiences.title: Director of Sales
experiences.description:
Reported to the VP of sales and provided sales leadership and coaching to a team of  Account Executives selling in to the USA and Canada through channel partners and distributors.  Highlights include:

ÔÇß	Coached a team of inside sales team to be responsible for the entire North America quota
ÔÇß	Implemented the sales playbook including sales policies, opportunity management protocol, goals and targets
ÔÇß	Team exceeded 2nd half FY 16 quota by 10 %
ÔÇß	Increased the North American maintenance renewal rate from 79% to it‚Äôs current level of 91%
ÔÇß	Helped shape the culture of office to similar start up software companies thus retaining and attracting top talent

experiences.title: Director of Sales - Growth
experiences.description:
Reported to the VP of sales and was accountable for providing sales leadership to a team of Account Executives in the Mid-Market (100 ‚Äì 500 employees) with focus on retaining and growing existing clients. Highlights include:

ÔÇß	Achieved 100+% of retention and growth goals in fiscal 2014

ÔÇß	Actively coaching and improving teams skill sets including opportunity management and sales effectiveness
ÔÇß	Most productive team globally working with Replicons‚Äô #1 business partner

recommendations:
Mike Sullivan



I worked with Hugh at Sitraka/ Quest Software on the same sales team.  Hugh has a charm and natural way about him that displays respect, empathy, and  builds confidence and trust with his customers and colleagues.   In the years  since we worked together, I have bumped into Hugh at conferences, usually joined by some of his reps.   As a manager, he has been consistent with these qualities, that have translated into great success as a Sales management leader.

Jim Chakos



Hugh is one of the best Managers I have ever had. He knew exactly how to handle me. He knew when to motivate and when to encourage. He was the perfect blend you need to be an inspirational Manager. I would highly recommend him for any Managerial Sales Team.
